AND YOU CAN GET THIS AND PORTAL 1 FOR 99 CENTS DURING SALES ! ! ! 
DO YOURSELF A FAVOR AND GET THESE GAMES FOR LITERALLY A DOLLAR
I love this game and it's fun with friends.

Portal 2 is a much better and more polished version of the original Portal, its story is a lot better and really makes you want a sequel, its mechanics are more vast, and there's a lot more to the puzzles. My only real problem is the parts in between chambers/chapters where a lot of story is involved, because there were a lot of times around chapter 6 (IIRC) that I thought were just really dumb, and I even got soft locked once. But the game is far from broken. It can be really fun when you finally solve a difficult puzzle. The game is much longer than its prequel, so the story really shines, especially with you having a new companion with you for most of the game. 

Puzzles are harder, funner, more complex, more varied
The Story is better and really adds onto Portal 1 and is a must if you are interested in the background of Aperture Science.
Co-op mode is really fun! If you aren't playing with a younger sibling that is, that can be really frustrating.
9/10 pretty epic tbh
